name: THALAPATHY-FILTER-BOT
description: This Telegram bot efficiently saves files to a database for easy inline searching on your channel. Built with Pyrogram and leveraging container technology.

CHANNELS.description: Username or ID of channel or group. Separate multiple IDs by space.

ADMINS.description: Username or ID of Admin. Separate multiple Admins by space.

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Bot Logs, provide a channel ID with -100xxxxxxx

AUTH_USERS.description: Username or ID of users to give access to inline search. Separate multiple users by space. Leave it empty if you don't want to restrict bot usage.

AUTH_CHANNEL.description: ID of channel. Ensure the bot is an admin in this channel. Users must subscribe to this channel to use the bot.

DATABASE_URI.description: MongoDB URI. Obtain this value from https://www.mongodb.com. For assistance, refer to https://youtu.be/dsuTn4qV2GA

DATABASE_NAME.description: Name of the database in MongoDB.

COLLECTION_NAME.description: Name of the collection. Defaults to Telegram_files. If using the same database, use a different collection name for each bot.
